Title: Bad Grandpa .5
Writer: Fax Bahr (story), Spike Jonze (screenplay), Johnny Knoxville (screenplay), Adam Small (story), Jeff Tremaine (screenplay)
Actors: Marilynn Allain, Georgina Cates, Madison Davis, George Faughnan
Plot: An unrated version of Bad Grandpa which includes over 40 minutes of additional outtakes and interviews.
